title: Thinking about drinking
brief_description: Presents the facts about alcoholic beverages with emphasis on their effects on the nervous system and behaviour. An alcoholic is a person who drinks so much that it interferes with their work and health, and alcoholism is a disease which constitutes a major health problem.
